scripts.client-compile-js: browserify src/client/index.js -t uglifyify --debug --standalone client-index | exorcist statics/lib/js/index.js.map > statics/lib/js/index.js
scripts.client-compile: npm run client-compile-css && npm run client-compile-js
scripts.watch-client-compile: npm run client-compile && watch-spawn -p 'src/client/**/*.js' -p 'src/client/**/*.css' npm run client-compile
scripts.watch-client-tests: npm run client-tests && watch-spawn -p 'src/client/**/*.js' -p 'tests/client/**/*.spec.js' npm run client-tests
scripts.watch-client-coverage: npm run client-coverage && watch-spawn -p 'src/client/**/*.js' -p 'tests/client/**/*.spec.js' npm run client-coverage
scripts.watch-server-tests: npm run server-tests && watch-spawn -p 'src/server/**/*.js' -p 'tests/server/**/*.spec.js' npm run server-tests
scripts.watch-server-coverage: npm run server-coverage && watch-spawn -p 'src/server/**/*.js' -p 'tests/server/**/*.spec.js' npm run server-coverage
